Refactor: Unify Koin modules and remove legacy `koin` and `octane` UI/data layers
This commit performs a major architectural refactoring by deleting two obsolete UI and data layer implementations (`koin` and `octane`) and unifying the application's dependency injection under a single set of Koin modules (`coreModule`, `dataModule`, `domainModule`, `viewModelModule`).
**Architecture & Dependency Injection** * **Unified Koin Modules**: * Introduces a `unifiedAppModule` that includes a new, single set of modules for `core`, `data`, `domain`, and `viewModels`. * `coreModule` now provides all essential cross-cutting dependencies like dispatchers, database DAOs, security utilities (Keystore, Biometrics), network monitoring, and analytics. * `dataModule` centralizes all repository implementations and API service definitions (Ktorfit, Jupiter, etc.). * `domainModule` provides all use cases for the entire application. * `viewModelModule` registers all ViewModels, including those for the new unified UI. * **Application-Level Configuration**: * `DecagonApplication` is updated to load the new `unifiedAppModule`. * Adds `workManagerFactory()` to Koin setup for background worker support.
**Code Cleanup & Deletions** * **Removed Legacy `koin` Project**: * Deleted the entire `com.decagon.koin` package and its sub-packages (`ui`, `domain`, `data`, `navigation`). This includes screens like `CoinListScreen`, `PortfolioScreen`, `AuthScreen`, `ProfileScreen`, and their corresponding ViewModels, repositories, and data models. * **Removed Legacy `octane` Project**: * Deleted numerous files from the `com.wallet` and `com.octane` packages, including UI components (`MetallicCard`, `HomeHeader`, `QuickActionGrid`), screens (`HomeScreen`, `SwapScreen`, `SettingsScreen`, `DAppBrowserScreen`), ViewModels (`HomeViewModel`, `SwapViewModel`, etc.), and the underlying data/domain layers. * **Consolidated DI Modules**: * Removed all old Koin modules (`decagonCoreModule`, `decagonNetworkModule`, `koinCoreModule`, `koinPortfolioModule`, `coreModule`, `networkModule`, `repositoryModule`, etc.) in favor of the new unified structure.
**New & Relocated Files** * **Unified Core/Data/Domain**: * Consolidated and moved essential classes (models, repositories, use cases, networking, security) into a single, coherent `com.decagon` package structure. * Re-introduced cleaned versions of `Asset`, `Token`, `Perp`, `DApp`, `Transaction`, and other core models. * Re-introduced repositories like `AssetRepository`, `TransactionRepository`, and `DiscoverRepository`. * **Unified UI/Theme**: * Added `AppColors`, `AppTypography`, and `Dimensions` to `com.decagon.ui.theme` to establish a single source for styling. * Moved utility composables like `shimmerEffect` and `metallicBorder` into `com.decagon.ui.utils`. * **Re-introduced ViewModels**: Created a new `viewmodels` package under `com.decagon.ui` to house all ViewModels for the unified architecture.

Refactor: Modernize Wallet UI, introduce composable components, and enhance navigation
This commit introduces a major user interface overhaul for the main wallet screen, replacing the previous design with a modern, "glassmorphic" aesthetic. It modularizes UI elements into reusable Jetpack Compose components and refactors navigation to be type-safe.
**UI/UX Overhaul (Jetpack Compose)** * **New `DecagonWalletScreen`:** Implemented a completely new wallet screen with a modern, gradient-based UI. It features a vertical scroll layout with distinct sections for the top bar, balance hero, portfolio chart, and quick actions. * **`FloatingTopBar` Component:** Created a new top bar component that includes a wallet switcher trigger (profile icon), a `NetworkPillBadge`, and a notifications icon. * **`BalanceHeroSection` Component:** Implemented a central display for the wallet balance, fiat value, and a copyable truncated address. * **`DecagonQuickActionsBar`:** Redesigned the quick actions (Send, Receive, Buy, Swap) into a floating bar with updated styling. It now disables "Send" and "Swap" for view-only wallets. * **`PortfolioPerformanceChart`:** Added a new, animated line chart to visualize portfolio history, complete with a `TimeRangeSelector` (1D, 1W, 1M, 1Y, ALL). * **Modal & Sheet Redesign:** * `DecagonSendSheet`, `DecagonReceiveSheet`, and `TokenSelectorSheet` have been restyled with a consistent dark, transparent background, updated fields, and improved button aesthetics. * Introduced `WalletSwitcherModal` and `NetworkSelectorModal` for improved wallet and network management directly from the main screen.
**Navigation & Architecture** * **Type-Safe Navigation (`DecagonRoute`):** Introduced a sealed interface `DecagonRoute` with `kotlinx.serialization` to replace string-based navigation routes, making navigation more robust and less error-prone. * **Refactored `DecagonNavGraph`:** Updated the navigation graph to use the new type-safe `DecagonRoute` objects for all destinations. * **Startup Logic:** `MainActivity` now uses `produceState` to determine the initial route (`Onboarding` or `Portfolio`) based on whether a wallet exists, simplifying the startup flow.
**Domain & Data** * **Extended Data Models:** Added `isViewOnly` to `DecagonWallet` and `logoUrl`, `valueUsd`, and `change24h` to `TokenBalance`. * **New Entities:** Added `PortfolioHistoryEntity` and `NotificationEntity` to the local database schema to support future features.
**Legacy & Code Cleanup** * **Deleted `DecagonSendSheet`:** The old send sheet was removed and replaced with a redesigned version in the `components` package. * **Removed Unused IDE files:** Deleted `.idea/.gitignore` and `.idea/inspectionProfiles/Project_Default.xml`. * Removed commented-out Firebase dependencies from `gradle/libs.versions.toml`.

Refactor: Optimize DiscoverRepository and remove legacy UI
This commit refactors the `DiscoverRepository` for improved performance and reliability, and removes legacy `Decagon` UI components that have been deprecated.
**Architecture & Data Layer** * **DiscoverRepository Refactor**: * Implement refresh logic that only fetches data if the cache is empty or stale, reducing unnecessary network calls. * Optimize data fetching by running API calls in parallel using `coroutineScope` and `async`. * Remove the `TokenLogoResolver`, now directly using logo URLs provided by the CoinGecko and DeFiLlama APIs. * Make `logoUrl` nullable in `PerpEntity` to handle cases where a logo is not available, preventing crashes. * Add `getXCount()` methods to `DiscoverDao` to efficiently check if tables are empty. * Simplify logging and remove verbose output for cleaner debugging. * **Koin/DI Cleanup**: * Remove `TokenLogoResolver` from dependency injection in `decagonCoreModule` and `repositoryModule`. * Move `SessionManager` and `SessionViewModel` DI setup into `decagonCoreModule` for better organization. * **API Service**: * Remove the unused `getSimplePrices` endpoint from `CoinGeckoApiService`.
**UI & Code Cleanup** * **Legacy UI Removal**: * Delete the entire legacy `com.decagon.ui` package, including `DecagonNavGraph`, `DecagonBottomNavBar`, and associated routes. * Remove `KoinCryptoAppMainActivity`, which was part of the old structure. * **Package & Import Fixes**: * Correct package names from `com.octane.wallet.*` to `com.wallet.*` in multiple files, including `DiscoverRepositoryImpl`, `DiscoverDao`, and various ViewModels. * Update import paths to reflect the corrected package structure.

Refactor Discover data fetching and add "View All" screens
**Architecture & Data Layer** * Refactor `DiscoverRepositoryImpl` to distinguish between limited (top 10) and unlimited data fetching for Tokens, Perps, and DApps. * Existing methods like `observeTokens()` are now optimized to fetch only 10 items for the main Discover screen's performance. * New methods (`observeAllTokens()`, `observeAllPerps()`, `observeAllDApps()`) are added to fetch the complete lists for dedicated "View All" screens. * Remove the slow, API-based `TokenLogoResolver` and rely directly on logos provided by the CoinGecko and DeFiLlama APIs. * Add `PerpLogoProvider`, a new service that uses a hardcoded map to provide instant logo resolution for perpetual futures contracts, eliminating network latency. * Update the `DriftContractDto.toEntity()` mapper to use the new `PerpLogoProvider` for instantaneous logo lookups.
**UI (Jetpack Compose)** * Implement `AllTokensScreen`, a new screen that displays a searchable, full list of all available tokens without a 10-item limit. * Create `AllTokensViewModel` and `ObserveAllTokensUseCase` to support the new unlimited token list screen. * Update `DiscoverScreen` to use the new limited-data repository methods (`.take(10)`), ensuring faster initial load times for its tabs. * Add placeholders for navigation from the Discover screen to the new "View All" screens for tokens, perps, and dApps.
**Code Quality & Fixes** * Corrected package names in import statements across multiple repository implementations (`AssetRepositoryImpl`, `TransactionRepositoryImpl`, etc.) to resolve build issues.

Refactor: Implement "View All" screens, simplify UI, and enhance data fetching
This commit introduces dedicated screens for viewing complete lists of tokens, perpetuals, and dApps, refactors the Discover and Swap screens for a cleaner UI, and improves the underlying data fetching and presentation logic.
**Features & Navigation** * **New "View All" Screens**: * Implement `AllTokensScreen`, `AllPerpsScreen`, and `AllDAppsScreen` to display searchable, paginated lists, removing the previous 10-item limit. * Add corresponding ViewModels (`AllTokensViewModel`, `AllPerpsViewModel`, `AllDAppsViewModel`) and UseCases (`ObserveAllTokensUseCase`, `ObserveAllPerpsUseCase`) to manage state for these new screens. * Update `UnifiedNavHost` and `UnifiedRoute` to include routes and navigation logic for `AllTokens`, `AllPerps`, and `AllDApps`. * **Discover Screen Simplification**: * Refactor `DiscoverScreen` from a complex, tabbed layout with a collapsing header into a simple, single-column `LazyColumn`. * Each category (Tokens, Perps, DApps) is now a distinct section with a "View All" button that navigates to its respective full-list screen.
**UI/UX (Jetpack Compose)** * **Swap Screen UI Refresh**: * Redesign the `SwapScreen` with a flatter, more modern aesthetic. `OutlinedCard` is replaced with simpler `Box` containers. * Update the amount input to use `BasicTextField` for a cleaner look. * Adjust component sizing and spacing for a more compact and refined layout. * **Component Refinement**: * Update `SwapPreviewCard` to align with the new flat design style.
**Architecture & Data Layer** * **Critical Detail Screen Fix**: * Modify `TokenDetailViewModel` and `PerpDetailViewModel` to use `observeAllTokens()` and `observeAllPerps()` respectively. This fixes a critical bug where navigating to a detail page for an item not in the top 10 would fail because it wasn't in the cache. * **Repository & Data Fetching**: * Remove `.take(10)` limitations from `DiscoverRepositoryImpl` for search and observation methods to support the new "View All" screens. * Increase the fetch limit in `refreshPerps` from 20 to 100 to provide a more comprehensive list. * **Perp Logo Provider**: * Significantly expand `PerpLogoProvider` to include over 200 hardcoded asset logos, covering the entire Solana ecosystem, major CEXs, and various DeFi categories for instant, zero-latency logo resolution. * **Dependency Injection**: * Register the new "View All" ViewModels and UseCases in the `decagonCoreModule` Koin module.
**Code Cleanup** * Remove unused Android Studio files (`.idea/caches/deviceStreaming.xml`, `.idea/misc.xml`). * Rename `AllTokensScreen.kt` and `AllTokensViewModel.kt` to the correct package structure.

Refactor: Modernize UI with Material 3 and enhance detail screens
This commit introduces a significant UI and architectural overhaul, replacing the previous "Octane" component library with a modern, clean Material 3 implementation. It enhances detail screens for tokens and perpetuals with animated headers, improved charts, and interactive features. It also refactors list and grid screens for a better user experience.
**UI/UX (Material 3 Migration)** * **Complete UI Redesign**: Replaced legacy `MetallicCard`, custom buttons, and layouts with standard Material 3 components (`Surface`, `Card`, `FilterChip`, `Button`). This applies to `WalletScreen`, `SwapScreen`, `SettingsScreen`, `AllTokensScreen`, and more. * **Enable Edge-to-Edge**: Enabled edge-to-edge display in `MainActivity` for a modern, immersive layout. * **New Detail Screens**: Implemented new, feature-rich detail screens for tokens (`TokenDetailsScreen.kt`) and perpetuals (`PerpDetailScreen.kt`). * **Animated Headers**: Added `AssetDetailHeader` and `AssetDetailTopBar` which animate based on scroll position, smoothly transitioning from a large header to a compact top app bar. * **Interactive Charts**: Integrated `EnhancedPriceChart` with drag-to-inspect tooltips and animated rendering. * **Pull-to-Refresh**: Added pull-to-refresh functionality on detail screens. * **Watchlist & Alerts**: Implemented watchlist toggling with toast feedback and placeholder for price alerts. * **Component Refactoring**: * Rebuilt `DiscoverScreen`, `AllTokensScreen`, `AllPerpsScreen`, and `AllDAppsScreen` with a focus on Material 3 components, removing old custom search bars and list items. * `All*` screens now feature a floating `SearchBarWithFilter` that hides on scroll. * `SwapScreen` and its sub-components (`TokenSelectorSheet`, etc.) are redesigned for a cleaner, more intuitive flow using `Surface` and `BasicTextField`. * Updated typography across the app to use `AppTypography` for consistency.
**Architecture & Features** * **ViewModel Enhancements**: * Added state management for pull-to-refresh (`isRefreshing`), watchlist status, and toast messages in `TokenDetailViewModel` and `PerpDetailViewModel`. * Added filter and sort state management (`sortType`, `showOnlyPositive`, etc.) to `AllTokensViewModel`, `AllPerpsViewModel`, and `AllDAppsViewModel`. * **Android File Provider**: Added `file_paths.xml` and configured `AndroidManifest.xml` to support sharing QR codes via `FileProvider`.
**Legacy Cleanup** * **Deleted Old Octane UI**: Removed numerous legacy files from the `com.octane.wallet` and `com.wallet.presentation` packages, including: * `OctaneApplication.kt` (Koin and Coil setup moved). * `AppNavHost.kt` (navigation is now handled by `UnifiedNavHost`). * `TokenDetailsScreen.kt` and `PerpDetailScreen.kt` (replaced by new versions in `com.decagon.ui.screen`). * `DiscoverToolbar.kt` and other related components. * **Package Relocation**: Moved and renamed several ViewModels and components from `com.wallet.presentation` to the appropriate `com.decagon.ui` packages for better organization (e.g., `DiscoverViewModel`, `TokenDetailViewModel`).

Feat: Implement background worker for fixing stuck transactions
This commit introduces an automated background process to detect and resolve stuck pending transactions, enhancing the wallet's reliability. It also optimizes UI performance by scoping the main wallet ViewModel to the Activity and reducing unnecessary data fetching.
**Features & Architecture** * **Transaction Cleanup Worker**: * Adds `TransactionCleanupWorker`, a new `CoroutineWorker` that runs periodically every 15 minutes. * The worker uses `TransactionDiagnostic` to check the status of pending transactions and automatically attempts to fix any that are stuck. * The worker is scheduled on app startup in `DecagonApplication` and is constrained to run only when there is a network connection. * Registers the new worker for dependency injection in the `decagonCoreModule`.
**UI & Performance** * **Activity-Scoped ViewModel**: * Refactors `UnifiedNavHost` to create the `DecagonWalletViewModel` at the Activity level. This ensures a single instance of the ViewModel is shared across composable screens, preserving state and preventing redundant data loads during navigation. * **Optimized Data Fetching**: * Introduces a new `activeWallet` state flow in `DecagonWalletViewModel` that provides wallet details *without* triggering balance and portfolio fetching. * Updates `DecagonSettingsScreen` to use this new static `activeWallet` flow, making it load instantly without waiting for network-dependent data. * **UI Cleanup**: * Removes the manual "Fix Stuck Transactions" button from the `DecagonSettingsScreen` as this process is now automated by the background worker.

This commit performs a major architectural refactoring by deleting two obsolete UI and data layer implementations (`koin` and `octane`) and unifying the application's dependency injection under a single set of Koin modules (`coreModule`, `dataModule`, `domainModule`, `viewModelModule`).
**Architecture & Dependency Injection** * **Unified Koin Modules**: * Introduces a `unifiedAppModule` that includes a new, single set of modules for `core`, `data`, `domain`, and `viewModels`. * `coreModule` now provides all essential cross-cutting dependencies like dispatchers, database DAOs, security utilities (Keystore, Biometrics), network monitoring, and analytics. * `dataModule` centralizes all repository implementations and API service definitions (Ktorfit, Jupiter, etc.). * `domainModule` provides all use cases for the entire application. * `viewModelModule` registers all ViewModels, including those for the new unified UI. * **Application-Level Configuration**: * `DecagonApplication` is updated to load the new `unifiedAppModule`. * Adds `workManagerFactory()` to Koin setup for background worker support.
**Code Cleanup & Deletions** * **Removed Legacy `koin` Project**: * Deleted the entire `com.decagon.koin` package and its sub-packages (`ui`, `domain`, `data`, `navigation`). This includes screens like `CoinListScreen`, `PortfolioScreen`, `AuthScreen`, `ProfileScreen`, and their corresponding ViewModels, repositories, and data models. * **Removed Legacy `octane` Project**: * Deleted numerous files from the `com.wallet` and `com.octane` packages, including UI components (`MetallicCard`, `HomeHeader`, `QuickActionGrid`), screens (`HomeScreen`, `SwapScreen`, `SettingsScreen`, `DAppBrowserScreen`), ViewModels (`HomeViewModel`, `SwapViewModel`, etc.), and the underlying data/domain layers. * **Consolidated DI Modules**: * Removed all old Koin modules (`decagonCoreModule`, `decagonNetworkModule`, `koinCoreModule`, `koinPortfolioModule`, `coreModule`, `networkModule`, `repositoryModule`, etc.) in favor of the new unified structure.
**New & Relocated Files** * **Unified Core/Data/Domain**: * Consolidated and moved essential classes (models, repositories, use cases, networking, security) into a single, coherent `com.decagon` package structure. * Re-introduced cleaned versions of `Asset`, `Token`, `Perp`, `DApp`, `Transaction`, and other core models. * Re-introduced repositories like `AssetRepository`, `TransactionRepository`, and `DiscoverRepository`. * **Unified UI/Theme**: * Added `AppColors`, `AppTypography`, and `Dimensions` to `com.decagon.ui.theme` to establish a single source for styling. * Moved utility composables like `shimmerEffect` and `metallicBorder` into `com.decagon.ui.utils`. * **Re-introduced ViewModels**: Created a new `viewmodels` package under `com.decagon.ui` to house all ViewModels for the unified architecture.
